meanings.definition: A clade of jawless fish within the superclass Agnatha that includes lampreys and their fossil relatives.
meanings.english_definition: A taxonomic group that includes lampreys and their extinct relatives; one of the two major groups of living jawless fishes.

examples.sentence: Lampreys belong to the clade Hyperoartia.
examples.translation: ヤツメウナギはハイペロアルティアという分類群に属する。

etymology.value: From hyper- (above) + aorta (the main artery) + -ia (forming a noun). Refers to the dorsal aorta passing above the heart in lampreys.
